oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Stereoselective intramolecular 1,3-dipolar cycloadditions
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: NAMBOOTHIRI, INN
HASSNER, A
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: intramolecular 1,3-dipolar cycloadditions
stereoselectivity
nitrile oxides
silyl nitronates
oximes
h-nitrones
azides
nitrilimines
olefin cyclo-additions
nitrile oxide cycloaddition
one-pot synthesis

functionalized pyrrolidines
stereocontrolled synthesis
heterocyclic-compounds
efficient synthesis
beta-nitrostyrenes
oxime
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An in depth account of intramolecular 1,3-dipolar cycloadditions involving dipoles such as nitrile oxides, silyl nitronates, H-nitrones, azides, and nitrilimines is presented with particular emphasis on the stereochemistry during the cyclo addition. Various methods employed for the generation of the dipoles and their applications to stereoselective synthesis are also discussed.
